## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.FIELD\_TEXTINPUT\_BOX\_SHADOW property

Whether or not to show a box shadow around the widget div. This is only a feature of full block fields.

**Signature:**

```typescript
FIELD_TEXTINPUT_BOX_SHADOW: boolean;
```
